full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LEGS PAR BSHAD PA CHU'I BSTAN BCOS LUGS GNYIS RLABS 'PHRENG BRGYA LDAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B CES LEGS PAR BSHAD PA CHU'I BSTAN BCOS LUGS GNYIS RLABS PHRENG BRGYA LDAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGAR RANG GI RGYUD LA BAG CHAGS 'JIG PA'I PHYIR DU RTZOM PA'I, ,DUS TSAD LA DPAG PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DU BGRANG RUNG TZAM KHA SHAS BRIS YOD NA'ANG, ,SHING GI BSTAN BCOS DE DAR SO CHE ZHING, ,MTHONG BYED MKHAN MANG DU 'OD PAR SNANG BAS DE LA @010A *, ,'GREL PA ZHIG KYANG GYUR NA LEGS ZHES, ,PA RON SU NYID SHOG NAS SNGAGS 'OS YON TAN DU MA'I RGYAN 'PHRENG 'DZIN PA NOM CHI ZHABS DRUNGS SKAL BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL DE'I BRI BAR BRTZAM YANG, ,DE'I CHOS KYI SA RGA LAM RIM LAS LOGS SU MI DGOS LA, ,GZHAN RNAMS GO SLA BA 'BA' ZHIG GTZOR 'DON DANG, DPE'ANG YONGS GRAGS MKHAS BLUN THAMS CAD LA CHAR BDE BA KHO NAR SBYAR STABS DE LAS GSAL DU RGYU MED PA LTA BUR SNANG ZHING, ,PHYOGS MTHUN GYI KHUNGS DPAL MGON KLU SGRUB KYI SHES RAB SDONG BU, SKYE BO SO THIGS GSUM DANG, TZA NA KA RGYAL BA'I LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS, MA SU PAKshAS BYAS PA'I LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS, NYI MA SBANGS PA'I MDZAD PA TSOGS SU BCUD PA MDZOD, ,MCHOS SRED KYI TSOGS BCAD BRYGA PA, DRI MA MED PA'I DRIS LAN RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA, SA SKYA'I LEGS BSHAD RNAMS DANG, GZHAN YANG 'PHRIN YIG BRLAB BYA SOGS DE MTHUN RNAMS DRANGS TE BSHAD MCHOG TSOGS CHES LCI BAR 'GYUR BAS, 'DIR GONG NAS GONG DU BGROD PA'I RIM PAS MJUG TU BYAS TE GO RIM BSTEBS PA SOGS DON 'GREL GYI TSUL DU BYAS NAS, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES DBEN GNAS YID DGA' CHOS @010B 'DZIN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GTZUG LAG LTA BA'I BLO MIG CAN BIKshU RATNA AA NANTAS BGYIS PA 'DI'ANG, SKYE BA RNAMS LA DGE BA'I 'JUG NGOGS GSAL BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,SARBA K'A LE SHRE YO BHA BA DU, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
